result.eng: Have you ever seen such a thing?
result.ga: An bhfaca tú riamh a leithéid
result.orig: An bhfaca tú riamh a leithéid
result.html: An bhfaca tú riamh a leithéidHave you ever seen such a thing?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfaca tú riaṁ a leiṫéidHave you ever seen such a thing?

result.eng: The first thing he reads is the sports page.
result.ga: An leathanach spóirt an chéad rud a léann sé
result.orig: An leathanach spóirt an chéad rud a léann sé
result.html: An leathanach spóirt an chéad rud a léann séThe first thing he reads is the sports page.
result.ponchtml: An leaṫanaċ spóirt an ċéad rud a léann séThe first thing he reads is the sports page.

result.eng: I knew there was a distinction between the two thing but I wasn't sure.
result.ga: Bhí a fhios agam go raibh idirdhealú éigin ann idir an dá rud ach ní raibh mé cinnte
result.orig: Bhí a fhios agam go raibh idirdhealú éigin ann idir an dá rud ach ní raibh mé cinnte
result.html: Bhí a fhios agam go raibh idirdhealú éigin ann idir an dá rud ach ní raibh mé cinnteI knew there was a distinction between the two thing but I wasn't sure.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a ḟios agam go raiḃ idirḋealú éigin ann idir an dá rud aċ ní raiḃ mé cinnteI knew there was a distinction between the two thing but I wasn't sure.

result.eng: Where would you get such a thing?
result.html: Cá bhfaighfeá a leithéidWhere would you get such a thing?
result.ponchtml: Cá ḃfaiġfeá a leiṫéidWhere would you get such a thing?

result.eng: He stayed away from the drink, that was the main thing.
result.ga: D'fhan sé ón ól b'in é an príomhrud
result.orig: D'fhan sé ón ól b'in é an príomhrud
result.html: D'fhan sé ón ól b'in é an príomhrudHe stayed away from the drink, that was the main thing.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan sé ón ól b'in é an príoṁrudHe stayed away from the drink, that was the main thing.

result.eng: We do the same thing year after year.
result.ga: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaidh bliana
result.orig: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaidh bliana
result.html: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaidh blianaWe do the same thing year after year.
result.ponchtml: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaiḋ blianaWe do the same thing year after year.

result.eng: It doesn't matter what I say, he does his own thing.
result.ga: Is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a chomhairle féin
result.orig: Is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a chomhairle féin
result.html: Is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a chomhairle féinIt doesn't matter what I say, he does his own thing.
result.ponchtml: Is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a ċoṁairle féinIt doesn't matter what I say, he does his own thing.

result.eng: As for the thing you said, you are right, but...
result.ga: Maidir leis an rud a dúirt tusa tá an ceart agat ach
result.orig: Maidir leis an rud a dúirt tusa tá an ceart agat ach
result.html: Maidir leis an rud a dúirt tusa tá an ceart agat achAs for the thing you said, you are right, but...
result.ponchtml: Maidir leis an rud a dúirt tusa tá an ceart agat aċAs for the thing you said, you are right, but...

result.eng: The whole thing is making me afraid.
result.ga: Tá an rud ar fad ag cur eagla orm
result.orig: Tá an rud ar fad ag cur eagla orm
result.html: Tá an rud ar fad ag cur eagla ormThe whole thing is making me afraid.
result.ponchtml: Tá an rud ar fad ag cur eagla ormThe whole thing is making me afraid.

result.eng: For those who escaped, it was a good thing that they did.
result.ga: Ba mhaith an mhaise don dream a d'éalaigh
result.orig: Ba mhaith an mhaise don dream a d'éalaigh
result.html: Ba mhaith an mhaise don dream a d'éalaighFor those who escaped, it was a good thing that they did.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ an ṁaise don dream a d'éalaiġFor those who escaped, it was a good thing that they did.

result.eng: The biggest thing to notice on these people is how amateurish they were.
result.ga: An rud is mó atá le tabhairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná chomh hamaitéarach is a bhí siad
result.orig: An rud is mó atá le tabhairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná chomh hamaitéarach is a bhí siad
result.html: An rud is mó atá le tabhairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná chomh hamaitéarach is a bhí siadThe biggest thing to notice on these people is how amateurish they were.
result.ponchtml: An rud is mó atá le taḃairt faoi deara ar an dream seo ná ċoṁ hamaitéaraċ is a ḃí siadThe biggest thing to notice on these people is how amateurish they were.

result.eng: I remember one thing I did.
result.ga: Is cuimhin liom rud amháin a rinne mé
result.orig: Is cuimhin liom rud amháin a rinne mé
result.html: Is cuimhin liom rud amháin a rinne méI remember one thing I did.
result.ponchtml: Is cuiṁin liom rud aṁáin a rinne méI remember one thing I did.

result.eng: While I was watching those live pictures [on TV], one thing was bothering me:...
result.ga: Agus mé ag breathnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo bhí rud amháin ag déanamh scime dom
result.orig: Agus mé ag breathnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo bhí rud amháin ag déanamh scime dom
result.html: Agus mé ag breathnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo bhí rud amháin ag déanamh scime domWhile I was watching those live pictures [on TV], one thing was bothering me:...
result.ponchtml: Agus mé ag breaṫnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo ḃí rud aṁáin ag déanaṁ scime domWhile I was watching those live pictures [on TV], one thing was bothering me:...

result.eng: The first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.
result.ga: B'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rud
result.orig: B'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rud
result.html: B'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rudThe first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.
result.ponchtml: B'é scéiṁliṫeoireaċt an ċéad rud a riṫ le daoine sular ṫáinig deiṁniú gurḃ iad cúinsí seismeaċa ba ċúis leis an rudThe first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.

result.eng: It's a good thing you told the truth, and for that I'll leave you alone.
result.ga: Is maith a rinne tú an fhírinne a inse agus ar a shon sin ní bhainfear duit
result.orig: Is maith a rinne tú an fhírinne a inse agus ar a shon sin ní bhainfear duit
result.html: Is maith a rinne tú an fhírinne a inse agus ar a shon sin ní bhainfear duitIt's a good thing you told the truth, and for that I'll leave you alone.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ a rinne tú an ḟírinne a inse agus ar a ẛon sin ní ḃainfear duitIt's a good thing you told the truth, and for that I'll leave you alone.

result.eng: You can excuse Babaí, she is only a soft young thing of a child.
result.ga: Tá Babaí inleithscéil go fóill nó níl inti ach luspairt linbh
result.orig: Tá Babaí inleithscéil go fóill nó níl inti ach luspairt linbh
result.html: Tá Babaí inleithscéil go fóill nó níl inti ach luspairt linbhYou can excuse Babaí, she is only a soft young thing of a child.
result.ponchtml: Tá Babaí inleiṫscéil go fóill nó níl inti aċ luspairt linḃYou can excuse Babaí, she is only a soft young thing of a child.

result.html: Ar béal maidineFirst thing in the morning.
result.ponchtml: Ar béal maidineFirst thing in the morning.

result.eng: It's a good thing the poor man isn't in.
result.ga: Is mór an gar gan an duine bocht a bheith istigh
result.orig: Is mór an gar gan an duine bocht a bheith istigh
result.html: Is mór an gar gan an duine bocht a bheith istighIt's a good thing the poor man isn't in.
result.ponchtml: Is mór an gar gan an duine boċt a ḃeiṫ istiġIt's a good thing the poor man isn't in.
